TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewTextBoxCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 顯示 控制項中可編輯的文字資訊。

span.span: Displays editable text information in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的用來顯示可編輯的文字為基礎的資訊的單一字串。The class is a specialized type of used to display a single string of editable text-based information. 目前所選主機控制使用者可以在其中編輯儲存格的值 (假設屬性設`false`)。The currently selected hosts a control in which the user can edit the cell's value (assuming the property of the is set to `false`). 資料行類型特製化來保存此類型的儲存格。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 根據預設，會初始化為新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要模式之後的現有資料行內的資料格，設定的資料行模式使用儲存格的屬性。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 資料行的儲存格相關屬性是類似的範本資料格屬性的包裝函式。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 變更範本儲存格的屬性值會影響只有儲存格根據範本在變更之後所新增。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 變更資料行的儲存格相關的屬性值，不過，將更新的範本資料格和資料行中，所有其他資料格，並重新整理資料行顯示，如有必要。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用當做範本。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 對資料行中的任何資料格的樣式變更會影響所有的資料行的資料格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

para.span: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，每當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容會複製到新的儲存格，並確定也將複製的值加入至衍生類別的任何屬性。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

summary.span: 為此 執行個體建立新的 。

span.span: An instance that supports the ControlType UI Automation property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回物件`CreateAccessibilityInstance`方法可支援 [UI 自動化](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md)只能在以.NET 開始的.NET framework 目標版本就會重新編譯的應用程式中的屬性Framework 4.7.2。The object returned by the `CreateAccessibilityInstance` method supports the [UI Automation](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md) property only in applications that are recompiled to target versions of the .NET Framework starting with the .NET Framework 4.7.2. 舊版的.NET Framework 為目標但在.NET Framework 4.7.2 上執行的應用程式也可以選擇這項功能使用的相容性參數。Applications that target an earlier version of the .NET Framework but are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.2 can opt in to this feature by using a compatibility switch. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[What's New in.NET Framework 中的協助工具](~/docs/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility.md)。For additional information, see [What's New in Accessibility in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility.md).

value.span: ，表示所有情況下的 型別。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一律為基礎的格式化值的型別因為文字方塊中只會處理文字資訊The type of the underlying formatted value is always because a text box only handles text information ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷資料格內容的型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of the cell contents. 在此範例中，屬性用來判斷是否要包含儲存格然後再嘗試將值轉換。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the cell contains a before attempting to convert the value. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會初始化裝載之編輯控制項的基底中所述方法。The method initializes the hosted editing control as described in the base method. 每次叫用，這個方法也會設定下列視覺化編輯控制項的屬性：For every invocation, this method also sets the following visual attributes of the editing control: - 屬性設定為 。The property is set to . - 和 屬性會設定為 `true`。The and properties are set to `true`. - 屬性設定為`initialFormattedValue`參數。The property is set to the `initialFormattedValue` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool KeyEntersEditMode (System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs e);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool KeyEntersEditMode(class System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Function KeyEntersEditMode (e As KeyEventArgs) As Boolean
public: override bool KeyEntersEditMode(System::Windows::Forms::KeyEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: ，表示已按下的按鍵。

span.span: A that represents the key that was pressed.

summary.span: 判斷是否應該根據指定的按鍵啟動編輯模式。

span.span: Determines if edit mode should be started based on the given key.

returns.span: 如果應該要啟動編輯模式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if edit mode should be started; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性控制設為 或，此控制項會使用這個方法來判斷此資料格取得焦點時使用者按下的 F2 以外的索引鍵是否會導致儲存格進入編輯模式。When the property of the control is set to or , the control uses this method to determine whether a key other than F2 that is pressed by the user while this cell has focus will cause the cell to enter edit mode. 這個方法會傳回`true`e 參數指示 （例如字母、 數字、 標點符號或空格鍵） 的一般資料輸入金鑰未加上 ALT 或 ctrl 鍵，如果不包括 SHIFT + 空格鍵，由控制項用於選取項目之用。This method returns `true` if the e parameter indicates an ordinary data-entry key (such as a letter, number, punctuation mark, or the SPACE key) unmodified by ALT or CTRL, excluding SHIFT+SPACE, which is used by the control for selection purposes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設鍵盤和滑鼠處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

Public Overridable Property MaxInputLength As Integer

summary.span: 取得或設定可輸入文字方塊中的最大字元數。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box.

value.span: 可以輸入文字方塊中的最大字元數，預設值為 32767。

span.span: The maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box; the default value is 32767.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不會影響輸入以程式設計的方式，透過儲存格的值或資料格的格式文字的長度。The property does not affect the length of text entered programmatically through the cell's value or through cell formatting. 它只會影響哪些使用者可以輸入和編輯。It affects only what the user can input and edit. 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定資料行中每個資料格的屬性。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

span.span: The value is less than 0.
